setupRPS
================

.. doxygenfunction:: setupRPS
   :project: FEHRobot

Example
-------------------

.. code-block:: c++
   :linenos:

   setupRPS();

Function Variables
------------------

.. note::
    This functions alters global variables.

+---------------+-------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| Type          | Name              | Description                                                                      |
+===============+===================+==================================================================================+
| ``float``     | ``trash_x``       | A trash variable used to detect a tap on the touch screen                        |
+---------------+-------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
| ``float``     | ``trash_y``       | A trash variable used to detect a tap on the touch screen                        |
+---------------+-------------------+----------------------------------------------------------------------------------+
